name: Go Boom!
description:
Blast through Boom Town in a fast-paced and frenetic endless arcade smasher that’s guaranteed to make you Go Boom! Your goal is total destruction. Why? Because smashing is fun, that’s why!

Go Boom! offers quick play mixed with a completely open world to explore. Different characters change the look of the world and the citizens of Boom Town are an eclectic mix of weird.

Explore Boom Town in our Open World mode, and destroy everything in sight. Or if you’re looking for more points to count towards your weekly league standings you can try Boom Blasting in a Battle Royale with 9 players all vying for the top spot in the Boom Town Arena. Or try your hand in Survival mode, and evade an onslaught of explosive enemies.

FEATURES
• Over 70 colorful and collectible​ characters
• 3 Game Modes including group play in a Battle Royale!
• Challenging daily challenges to hone your destruction skills
• Bombs! TNT! Fireworks! And Kale!

Now get in there and Go Boom!

Check out all the other games from Rogue on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/dod-media-group/id1303667551?mt=8
